project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Build a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Create Room Class and Navigation Logic
Implement Item Class for Collectible Items
Develop Inventory System for Player's Items
Create Challenge Mechanism (e.g., puzzles or simple combat)
Write tests for Room, Item, and Inventory functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
